sentences.sContent: Because of the natural fluidity and immediacy of marketing, we are constantly building new areas of knowledge.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because of the natural fluidity and immediacy of marketing, we are constantly building new areas of knowledge.
sentences.sCn: 由于市场固有的流动性和即时性，所以我们经常构建新知识领域。

sentences.sContent: Sexual fluidity occurs in both men and women, but it has been suggested that women are potentially more open and malleable in this regard.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sexual fluidity occurs in both men and women, but it has been suggested that women are potentially more open and malleable in this regard.
sentences.sCn: 除了女性，性别的流动性同样会出现在男性身上，但这有证据显示女性在这个方面更有可能和可塑性。

words.tran: 流动的；流畅的；不固定的
流动性；流质；不固定性，易变性
